meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Albania.
meanings.sent1: In Albania, you can buy many things with just a few qindarkas.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for qindarkas at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The piggy bank was so full of qindarkas that it almost burst!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a handful of shiny qindarkas, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the coins clinking together was like music made of qindarkas.

meanings.sent1: She counted the qindarkas one by one to make sure she had enough.
meanings.sent2: The market was bustling with vendors accepting qindarkas as payment.
meanings.sent3: The kids played a game, pretending the qindarkas were magical coins.
meanings.sent4: The field glittered with scattered qindarkas, like stars fallen from the sky.
meanings.sent5: The bag was heavy with the weight of countless qindarkas inside.
